name: feed_in_need
description: A full-stack web application for food donation management that connects food donors with receivers in need. Built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

scripts.start: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix backend && cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
